data.name: Torque Drift - AdamLZ R32 Driver Car
data.detailed_description: The official Adam LZ's Rb26 R32 Skyline Sedan, as seen on his YouTube channel.
data.about_the_game: The official Adam LZ's Rb26 R32 Skyline Sedan, as seen on his YouTube channel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB (GeForce GTX 970 / amd RX 5500 XT)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
